Package assemAssist

Class CarModelSpecification

java.lang.Object
assemAssist.CarModelSpecification
public class CarModelSpecification extends Object
Class representing a car model with a modelName and a car model specification.

      public CarModelSpecification(String modelName, int standardTaskTime, TreeMap<String,HashSet<String>> availableOptions)

      Parameters:
      modelName - The name for the car model.
      standardTaskTime - The standard workstation time for this car model.
      availableOptions - The car model specification for the car model.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - | modelName is null | modelName is the empty string | carModelSpecification is null
